creator: giacomodemartino@gmail.com
text: importFromXML method in XSSFImportFromXML does not automatically update the end cell reference on xml mapped tables, according to the actual number of imported rows

This bug is missing important details such as test code. Please update this bug so that someone can easily reproduce the problem (if it still exists, XSSFTable is more mature in the latest POI release, 3.16 beta 1, than it was in 3.8).

If this bug report is no longer necessary, the bug will be closed.
creator: onealj@apache.org

text: No update for a long time, thus closing this now, please reopen with more information if this is still a problem for you.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
